Introduction
This topic contains information on claims based on service in the Reserves and National Guard, including
initial duty of a reservist or National Guard member
ADT and IADT service in the Reserves and National Guard
other types of reserve or National Guard service
active duty support (ADS) service
service department records for verifying periods of ADT and IADT
deciding line of duty status for claims based on ADT or IADT
definition of injury for ADT and IADT purposes
presumption of soundness for ADT and IADT
considering presumptive SC based on ADT and IADT
considering aggravation in claims for SC based on ADT and IADT
, and
adjudicating claims based on ADT and IADT
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A - Establishing Veteran Status
